mapper.insert: insert into orders (member_idx, deliveryDate, receiverName, receiverPhonenum, address, totalPrice, discountPrice, deliveryFee, purchase) values (#{member_idx}, #{deliveryDate}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhonenum}, #{address}, #{totalPrice}, #{discountPrice}, #{deliveryFee}, #{purchase})
mapper.select: select P.idx AS productMain_idx, P.productName, P.productPrice, C.productCnt, P.productImg, C.orders_idx, M.orderDate from ordersDetail C join productMain P on C.productMain_idx = P.idx join orders M on M.idx = C.orders_idx where M.member_idx = #{idx}
